MaleText: This is a dangerous line of business!$B$BMiran just left with a delivery. He should be back in a few minutes.
Lots to do, lots to do! The Union's given us deadlines and they're not the sort you want to miss!
Director Riddlevox put me in charge of the Union's shredder development program. Few months on the job and I'm already in hot water! I could use your help, $n!

See, the Venture Company's new shredder is better than my latest, from the interchangeable hands to the control grips! My boss has given me a pretty strict deadline, but my boys and I couldn't come up with anything.$b$bNothing was working, so we decided to "borrow" one of their prototypes. I sent Wizzlecrank to the Sludge Fen to steal one, but he hasn't gotten back yet!
Come closer, young one.  In my time I could hear the flutter of a prey's beating heart, but now you must speak up if you want your words heard.
You killed Ghost Howl.  You're a stud!

I have run through these plains for many, many seasons.  And I have hunted great beasts.  And I had never been bested... until I faced Ghost Howl.$B$BLong ago, the massive wolf was an ally to the tauren and fought bravely against the Burning Legion.  But he was wounded savagely by a demon, and the tear in his flesh never healed.  Eventually... it drove Ghost Howl mad.$B$BNow he roams the plains in agony, seeking an end to his pain.  To my shame, when we fought I lacked the strength to slay him...
Greetings mage.  Shall I provide you with further insight into the world of magic?
FemaleText: Greetings mage.  Shall I provide you with further insight into the world of magic?

MaleText: Well met, $c.  My advice to you is this: As you travel the world, be wary of magic for it will burn the untrained.
FemaleText: Well met, $c.  My advice to you is this: As you travel the world, be wary of magic for it will burn the untrained.

MaleText: Greetings.  I'm a mage trainer, and you're a mage.
FemaleText: Greetings.  I'm a mage trainer, and you're a mage.

MaleText: Well met, $c.  My advice to you is this: As you travel the world, be wary of magic for it will burn the untrained.
FemaleText: Well met, $c.  My advice to you is this: As you travel the world, be wary of magic for it will burn the untrained.

MaleText: Greetings.  I'm a gnome mage trainer, and you're a mage.
FemaleText: Greetings.  I'm a gnome mage trainer, and you're a mage.

MaleText: Well met, $c.  You want some advice?  Befriend a mage!  We have a trick or two up our sleeves, we do...
FemaleText: Well met, $c.  You want some advice?  Befriend a mage!  We have a trick or two up our sleeves, we do...

MaleText: Greetings.  I'm an undead mage trainer, and you're a mage.
FemaleText: Greetings.  I'm an undead mage trainer, and you're a mage.

MaleText: Well met, $c.  My advice to you is this: As you travel the world, be wary of magic for it will burn the untrained.
FemaleText: Well met, $c.  My advice to you is this: As you travel the world, be wary of magic for it will burn the untrained.

MaleText: Greetings, $c.  Are you here to learn of the hidden arts?
FemaleText: Greetings, $c.  Are you here to learn of the hidden arts?

MaleText: Greetings, $c.  I pity your kind, for the secrets of true magic are beyond you...
FemaleText: Greetings, $c.  I pity your kind, for the secrets of true magic are beyond you...
It is not yet your time. I shall aid your journey back to the realm of the living... for a price.

MaleText: With the sanction of Lord Varimathras, the Deathstalkers' numbers grow. More blades to strike at our enemies when they least expect it.
FemaleText: With the sanction of Lord Varimathras, the Deathstalkers' numbers grow. More blades to strike at our enemies when they least expect it.

MaleText: What do you want, $c? I'm running late, and my employer doesn't look kindly on tardiness.
Yes, I am. What's it to you?
The Shattered Hand will see the Horde to their former glory, unhindered by the timidness of the Warchief.
FemaleText: The Shattered Hand will see the Horde to their former glory, unhindered by the timidness of the Warchief.

MaleText: Naralex sleeps again!$b$bLong ago, Naralex journeyed to this cavern with the honorable goal of entering the Emerald Dream and regrowing the Barrens into a lush forest. His focus waned and his thoughts became tainted by serpentine visions.$b$bNow, reptilian beasts seep from his dreams to the land. He must be awoken from the nightmare or he will be forever lost, and a great evil unleashed.$b$bOnly after his corrupted servants, the Fanglords, have been slain can I perform the awakening ritual.~~

The Fanglords are dead! All hope is not lost!$b$bThe awakening ritual is quite complex, however. It cannot be done alone.$b$bI will handle all of the necessary preparations but I will need you to protect me. The nightmares summoned from Naralex's journey through the Emerald Dream prove to be quite formidable. Without your help, this mission is doomed.$b$bWhen you are ready to defend me, say the word, and I shall lead the way to Naralex's chamber.
The machine adjusts to face you.$B$BOn the back of the machine is an empty, oddly misshapen slot with an engraving that reads: "Propirtee o' Cap'n Gelkak Gyromast"
Hey!  Are you on an errand for Tirth?  If I were you I'd get as far away from him as I could!  His mind's been pickled from too much drink but his magic's as strong as ever!
Sure, I'll tell you the phrase.  As long as I don't have to go anywhere near Tirth!
Gelkak's key slides into the vacant slot.
Do you mock me while I am unable to defend myself, bound to this ball of iron?
One of the humans has the key to this infernal contraption. Eston I think they said his name was.
Get away from here, $c, or they'll put you in chains as well.
Marlgen... One of the jailors. He has the key to my bonds.
The Bank of Stormwind is located in the Trade District just northwest of the city gates. Here, let me show you on your map.
FemaleText: The Bank of Stormwind is located in the Trade District just northwest of the city gates. Here, let me show you on your map.

MaleText: I wish the snow would just all melt away. It's always getting my robe wet and messing up everything!
Stupid snow... Hey, you're, $n, aren't you? I've just received a message asking for you.
You've been summoned by Lago Blackwrench, warlock master of Ironforge. You'd do yourself well to report to him immediately. You'll find him in the Forlorn Cavern district of the city.
Greetings $R, I am Tharnariun Treetender.
If you ask me, I think the goblins are a shoe in.  We have the tools, and we have the talent!
FemaleText: If you ask me, I think the goblins are a shoe in.  We have the tools, and we have the talent!

MaleText: If it weren't for that cursed, gnomish luck, they'd never win a race!
FemaleText: If it weren't for that cursed, gnomish luck, they'd never win a race!

MaleText: If I were you, I'd buy a goblin race voucher.  Rooting for the other team is a waste of time.
FemaleText: If I were you, I'd buy a goblin race voucher.  Rooting for the other team is a waste of time.

MaleText: My money's on the goblins!  And if you have any sense then yours is too!
FemaleText: My money's on the goblins!  And if you have any sense then yours is too!

MaleText: I heard they were going to try to blow up the gnome's car in the next race!  True or not, I'd stand clear of their pit area.
FemaleText: I heard they were going to try to blow up the gnome's car in the next race!  True or not, I'd stand clear of their pit area.

MaleText: Oh, you mean Johnson?  I heard he's in hiding.
FemaleText: Oh, you mean Johnson?  I heard he's in hiding.

MaleText: If it weren't for the goblins' inconceivable, dumb luck, they'd crash their car during every race!
FemaleText: If it weren't for the goblins' inconceivable, dumb luck, they'd crash their car during every race!

MaleText: These races are a great opportunity to show our ingenuity!
FemaleText: These races are a great opportunity to show our ingenuity!

MaleText: I installed a new device in our car's matrix regulometer.  That should increase its velocity quotient by a factor of no less than fifteen!
FemaleText: I installed a new device in our car's matrix regulometer.  That should increase its velocity quotient by a factor of no less than fifteen!

MaleText: My son could design a faster car than that clunky goblin junk heap!
FemaleText: My son could design a faster car than that clunky goblin junk heap!

MaleText: My Gizmotic Almanacotron says that we should beat the goblins by twenty seconds more than we did last time!
FemaleText: My Gizmotic Almanacotron says that we should beat the goblins by twenty seconds more than we did last time!

MaleText: Tirth's not himself these days, and neither is his assistant.
FemaleText: Tirth's not himself these days, and neither is his assistant.

MaleText: Johnson?  I think he's around here somewhere...
FemaleText: Johnson?  I think he's around here somewhere...

MaleText: Hah!  Tirth's been looking for him for days, but he doesn't want to be found.  He's chicken!
FemaleText: Hah!  Tirth's been looking for him for days, but he doesn't want to be found.  He's chicken!

MaleText: At last! I am finally free from this cell!$b$bThe Kirin Tor sent me from Dalaran to investigate Arugal's progress with the undead here in Silverpine Forest. Little did we know that the wizard had lost his grasp on sanity.$b$bI must report this mess at once! But before I leave, allow me to undo the magical lock on the courtyard door.$b$bYou defeated Rethilgore, perhaps you will survive what lies beyond....

At last! Someone to free me from this cell!$b$bHigh Executor Hadrec sent us to gather information on the Keep so that a plan could be formulated to overthrow Arugal once and for all.$b$bBut the old wizard has many tricks up his sleeve and we were detected by a magical ward. I was thrown in this prison. Vincent was not so lucky.$b$bI must return to Hadrec to debrief him at once. But first I will pick the lock to the courtyard door for you. Perhaps you can try your luck against the foes that lurk beyond.

I once followed the ways of the Twilight's Hammer. Obsessed with reviving the Old Gods, I journeyed deep into this lair to try to draw power from the cursed beast, Aku'mai!$b$bAfter witnessing the sacrifice of countless innocents, I came to my senses.$b$bI was trapped but now I am free! But so far from my homeland of Khaz Modan!$b$bBrave adventurer, I offer you passage to a very special land in return for slaying Aku'mai. If you wish, I can port you to the city of Darnassus.
Welcome to my Inn, weary traveler. What can I do for you?
FemaleText: Welcome to my Inn, weary traveler. What can I do for you?

MaleText: Rest your weary bones for a spell.
FemaleText: Rest your weary bones for a spell.

MaleText: As the wind on the plains, you are always welcome here.
FemaleText: As the wind on the plains, you are always welcome here.

MaleText: Fill yer tankard and pull up a chair. We've stories to tell and kegs to empty.
FemaleText: Fill yer tankard and pull up a chair. We've stories to tell and kegs to empty.

MaleText: Your body looks worn and your spirit weary. Rest yourself beneath our roof and allow Elune to guide your dreams.
FemaleText: Your body looks worn and your spirit weary. Rest yourself beneath our roof and allow Elune to guide your dreams.

MaleText: Come in, come in. Just don't sit too close to the stove. It hasn't exploded yet today, but just to be safe I think you should sit elsewhere.
FemaleText: Come in, come in. Just don't sit too close to the stove. It hasn't exploded yet today, but just to be safe I think you should sit elsewhere.
Hello $r, it is a pleasure to make your acquaintance.~
Well, well... look what the cat brung in... and how can I help you, $c?

MaleText: You can find the gryphon master on the northeast rampart overlooking the Valley of Heroes.
FemaleText: You can find the gryphon master on the northeast rampart overlooking the Valley of Heroes.

MaleText: Ahhh, you are looking for Dungar Longdrink. He has some of the fastest gryphons this side of Khaz Modan! You can find him up on the ramparts in the Trade District.
FemaleText: Ahhh, you are looking for Dungar Longdrink. He has some of the fastest gryphons this side of Khaz Modan! You can find him up on the ramparts in the Trade District.

MaleText: Lookin' to take a gryphon ride, eh? Dungar keeps his birds up on the rampart in the Trade District. Just remember to hold on tight!
FemaleText: Lookin' to take a gryphon ride, eh? Dungar keeps his birds up on the rampart in the Trade District. Just remember to hold on tight!

MaleText: Gryphons, eh? Never really cared for the beasts but to each their own.~~You can find Dungar Longdrink on the rampart in the Trade District.
FemaleText: Gryphons, eh? Never really cared for the beasts but to each their own.~~You can find Dungar Longdrink on the rampart in the Trade District.

MaleText: You can find Aldwin Laughlin at the Stormwind Vistor's Center in the Trade District.
FemaleText: You can find Aldwin Laughlin at the Stormwind Vistor's Center in the Trade District.

MaleText: Gonna make a guild, are ya? Good luck to ya then!~~Talk to Aldwin Laughlin in the Stormwind Vistor's Center. It's in the Trade District right as you come in from the Valley of Heroes.
FemaleText: Gonna make a guild, are ya? Good luck to ya then!~~Talk to Aldwin Laughlin in the Stormwind Vistor's Center. It's in the Trade District right as you come in from the Valley of Heroes.

MaleText: Ahhh, Stormwind Visitor's Center is what you are looking for then. It's the first building on the left as you walk through the front gates from the Valley of Heroes.
FemaleText: Ahhh, Stormwind Visitor's Center is what you are looking for then. It's the first building on the left as you walk through the front gates from the Valley of Heroes.

MaleText: Which class trainer are you looking for?
FemaleText: Which class trainer are you looking for?

MaleText: The magi congregate in the Wizard's Sanctum in the Mage Quarter. Quite a tower they have there. Makes our barracks look like peasant hovels.
FemaleText: The magi congregate in the Wizard's Sanctum in the Mage Quarter. Quite a tower they have there. Makes our barracks look like peasant hovels.

MaleText: Oh, looking for some arcane enlightenment are you? No place better then then Wizard's Sanctum in the Mage Quarter.
FemaleText: Oh, looking for some arcane enlightenment are you? No place better then then Wizard's Sanctum in the Mage Quarter.

MaleText: Sounds like you want to talk to Maginor Dumas! You can usually find him in the Wizard's Sanctum in the Mage Quarter. Course, you never know when or where those magi will portal off to.
FemaleText: Sounds like you want to talk to Maginor Dumas! You can usually find him in the Wizard's Sanctum in the Mage Quarter. Course, you never know when or where those magi will portal off to.

MaleText: You want to talk to Osborne then. No finer teacher of the stealth arts than him in Stormwind. Look for him over in Old Town.
FemaleText: You want to talk to Osborne then. No finer teacher of the stealth arts than him in Stormwind. Look for him over in Old Town.

MaleText: Bah, rogues have done nothing but make our job here in Stormwind harder. I wish I could drag both Osborne and Mathias both out of Old Town and right to the Stockade.
FemaleText: Bah, rogues have done nothing but make our job here in Stormwind harder. I wish I could drag both Osborne and Mathias both out of Old Town and right to the Stockade.

MaleText: Old Town is where you should go if you want to find rogues. It's in the northeast corner of Stormwind.
FemaleText: Old Town is where you should go if you want to find rogues. It's in the northeast corner of Stormwind.

MaleText: Warriors can usually be found either at the Pig and Whistle Tavern or the Barracks in Old Town. Tell ya though, the tavern is probably a better place look.
FemaleText: Warriors can usually be found either at the Pig and Whistle Tavern or the Barracks in Old Town. Tell ya though, the tavern is probably a better place look.

MaleText: Looking for some training, eh? I could train you better then anyone in Stormwind but the guard prohibits it. I guess you will have to settle for one of those has beens hanging out around the Barracks or at the Pig and Whistle Tavern in Old Town.
FemaleText: Looking for some training, eh? I could train you better then anyone in Stormwind but the guard prohibits it. I guess you will have to settle for one of those has beens hanging out around the Barracks or at the Pig and Whistle Tavern in Old Town.

MaleText: Check around Old Town at the Barracks or the Pig and Whistle Tavern. If you go to the tavern, be sure to sample some of the fine brews. Puts the dwarven ales to shame, I tell ya.
FemaleText: Check around Old Town at the Barracks or the Pig and Whistle Tavern. If you go to the tavern, be sure to sample some of the fine brews. Puts the dwarven ales to shame, I tell ya.

MaleText: Well, you can find Theridan or Maldryn by the moonwell in the Park.  Just head to the western area of Stormwind, north of the Mage District, but west of the Cathedral Square.
FemaleText: Well, you can find Theridan or Maldryn by the moonwell in the Park.  Just head to the western area of Stormwind, north of the Mage District, but west of the Cathedral Square.

MaleText: The Park is where you want to go if you are looking for druid trainers. Theridan and Maldryn can usually be found by the moonwell in the center of the district.
FemaleText: The Park is where you want to go if you are looking for druid trainers. Theridan and Maldryn can usually be found by the moonwell in the center of the district.

MaleText: A child of nature are we? Then you need look no further then the moonwell in the Park.
FemaleText: A child of nature are we? Then you need look no further then the moonwell in the Park.

MaleText: The Cathedral of Light in Cathedral Square is home to the priests of Stormwind. There you will find High Priestess Laurena.
FemaleText: The Cathedral of Light in Cathedral Square is home to the priests of Stormwind. There you will find High Priestess Laurena.

MaleText: Laurena is the High Priestess of Stormwind. You can find her in the Catheral of Light in Cathedral Square.
FemaleText: Laurena is the High Priestess of Stormwind. You can find her in the Catheral of Light in Cathedral Square.

MaleText: I would suggest looking in the Cathedral of Light in Cathedral Square.
FemaleText: I would suggest looking in the Cathedral of Light in Cathedral Square.

MaleText: If you are looking to become a mighty paladin, there is no better teacher then Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker. He can be found in the Cathedral of Light in Cathedral Square.
FemaleText: If you are looking to become a mighty paladin, there is no better teacher then Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker. He can be found in the Cathedral of Light in Cathedral Square.

MaleText: Thorfin Stoneshield came to us all the way from Ironforge to bring us his expertise in hunting.  If you don't mind breathing the smoke filled air of the Dwarven District then you'll find him at his house in the northeast area of the district.
FemaleText: Thorfin Stoneshield came to us all the way from Ironforge to bring us his expertise in hunting.  If you don't mind breathing the smoke filled air of the Dwarven District then you'll find him at his house in the northeast area of the district.

MaleText: What? I don't know of any warlock trainers in Stormwind. ~~Although... There have been some sightings of demonic activity over by The Slaughtered Lamb in the Mage Quarter. I suppose you could check there.
FemaleText: What? I don't know of any warlock trainers in Stormwind. ~~Although... There have been some sightings of demonic activity over by The Slaughtered Lamb in the Mage Quarter. I suppose you could check there.

MaleText: What brings you to this part of the world, $n?
FemaleText: What brings you to this part of the world, $n?

MaleText: He grows fatter and more corrupt with each passing day. Ye can smell the stink comin' off o' his body. He be dirty, an' I dun just mean he be needin' a wash.$B$BEnough babblin' from Hulfdan. Where did ye come from and how can me help ye, $c?~
Which profession trainer are you looking for?
FemaleText: Which profession trainer are you looking for?

MaleText: If you need training in alchemy, there is only one place in Stormwind you need to go... Alchemy Needs. You can find it in the Mage Quarter along the outer rim of shops.
FemaleText: If you need training in alchemy, there is only one place in Stormwind you need to go... Alchemy Needs. You can find it in the Mage Quarter along the outer rim of shops.

MaleText: Therum Deepforge is the dwarf you want to talk to. One of the finest blacksmiths around if you ask me. You can find him in the heart of the Dwarven District.
FemaleText: Therum Deepforge is the dwarf you want to talk to. One of the finest blacksmiths around if you ask me. You can find him in the heart of the Dwarven District.

MaleText: If you are looking to become a great cook, venture over to the Pig and Whistle Tavern in Old Town and talk to Stephen Ryback. That man knows how to cook up a rack of ribs like no other.~~Man... now you got me hungry for some of his famous ribs. Don't count on him teaching you that recipe though!
FemaleText: If you are looking to become a great cook, venture over to the Pig and Whistle Tavern in Old Town and talk to Stephen Ryback. That man knows how to cook up a rack of ribs like no other.~~Man... now you got me hungry for some of his famous ribs. Don't count on him teaching you that recipe though!

MaleText: Stormwind's resident engineer trainer is an ingenious gnome by the name of Lilliam Sparkspindle. He can be found in the back of the Dwarven District.
FemaleText: Stormwind's resident engineer trainer is an ingenious gnome by the name of Lilliam Sparkspindle. He can be found in the back of the Dwarven District.

MaleText: The Cathedral of Light is the center of all the healing practices of Stormwind. There you can find Shaina Fuller to help you learn this craft.
FemaleText: The Cathedral of Light is the center of all the healing practices of Stormwind. There you can find Shaina Fuller to help you learn this craft.

MaleText: You can find Tannysa standing outside Alchemy Needs in the Mage Quarter.
FemaleText: You can find Tannysa standing outside Alchemy Needs in the Mage Quarter.

MaleText: Want to learn leatherworking, eh? Simon Tanner would be able to teach you. He can be found in Old Town at the Protective Hide.
FemaleText: Want to learn leatherworking, eh? Simon Tanner would be able to teach you. He can be found in Old Town at the Protective Hide.

MaleText: Gelman Stonehand would be the one to talk to. I think he has a house over in the Dwarven District but I can't remember exactly. I would check over there.
FemaleText: Gelman Stonehand would be the one to talk to. I think he has a house over in the Dwarven District but I can't remember exactly. I would check over there.

MaleText: You are gonna want to head over to Old Town and drop by the Protective Hide if you are lookin' to learn skinning.
FemaleText: You are gonna want to head over to Old Town and drop by the Protective Hide if you are lookin' to learn skinning.

MaleText: Duncan's Textiles employs one of the finest tailors in Stormwind, Georgio Bolero. Look for the shop over in the Mage Quarter.
FemaleText: Duncan's Textiles employs one of the finest tailors in Stormwind, Georgio Bolero. Look for the shop over in the Mage Quarter.

MaleText: Plucky doesn't want Tirth to know he's still in the Shimmering Flats, so he turned himself into a chicken!$B$BIf you find Plucky, beckon him to you.  Maybe he'll come out of hiding.
I hope yer ready to work.
Welcome to the races!  Enjoy your stay, and don't bet all your money in one place!
FemaleText: Welcome to the races!  Enjoy your stay, and don't bet all your money in one place!

MaleText: Hello, $c!  Welcome to the races at the Shimmering Flats!
FemaleText: Hello, $c!  Welcome to the races at the Shimmering Flats!

MaleText: Who has the fastest car?  Who knows?!?
FemaleText: Who has the fastest car?  Who knows?!?

MaleText: The goblin racer packs a lot of punch, but the gnomes hid a trick or two in their car...
FemaleText: The goblin racer packs a lot of punch, but the gnomes hid a trick or two in their car...

MaleText: What do you need directions to?
FemaleText: What do you need directions to?

MaleText: Like a cat dragged in from the rain, you scratch and claw, then do it all over again... I'll be back for more...$B$BOh, I didn't see you enter, $n! What can I do for you?
If we are to make these new lands ours then we must have places to rest our battle weary bodies. Lay your axe by the fire and share the stories of your mighty battles.
FemaleText: If we are to make these new lands ours then we must have places to rest our battle weary bodies. Lay your axe by the fire and share the stories of your mighty battles.

MaleText: Nothing like spending a day down at Crystal Lake fishing. Arnold Leland is the man that taught me. You can usually find him out on the dock in the Canal District just fishing the day away. ~~Oh, and don't believe any of the stories he tells you about monsters in the canals either.
FemaleText: Nothing like spending a day down at Crystal Lake fishing. Arnold Leland is the man that taught me. You can usually find him out on the dock in the Canal District just fishing the day away. ~~Oh, and don't believe any of the stories he tells you about monsters in the canals either.

MaleText: Lucan Cordell has a small shop on the canal by the Stockade. I am sure he will be able to teach you the art of enchanting.
FemaleText: Lucan Cordell has a small shop on the canal by the Stockade. I am sure he will be able to teach you the art of enchanting.

MaleText: I walk this road alone, seeking ways to defend my honor and rid this land of our enemies.$B$BWhat can I do for you, $n?

Yes, I have seen the shaman you seek. Last I saw her, she was to the west of here. She hides in the hills above the Razormane tribe. If you're clever, you'll be able to find a path to her hut in the hills. It is not too far north of here. That path should allow you to find her without fighting through the quilboar.
The Order of the Shattered Hand existed before Thrall and shall exist after Thrall.
Zando'zan of the Shattered Hand. How can Zando'zan help you? He can't! He won't!~
Are you here for training?  Or are you just here to waste a warrior's time.
FemaleText: Are you here for training?  Or are you just here to waste a warrior's time.

MaleText: The machine comes alive at your touch.
He'll bring you mead$bHe'll bring you beer$bA grinning face from ear to ear$bHe's served us all from year to year$bWe call him Smiling Jim.
This is an exotic sample of flora, unseen in other parts of Teldrassil.
This plant stands out among the normal flora of Teldrassil, and emits a strange, purplish glow.

Salutations.  My function is to offer access to and, when permissible, insight into information regarding the Creators' synthesis of the Earthen on the world designated as Azeroth.  I am ready to share this information with you now at your leisure.

The Earthen are a synthesized race engineered by the Creators, functioning as one of the seed races in the initial population of the world designated as Azeroth.  The Earthen were created to aid the Creators' efforts in shaping the deep regions of this world.$B$BThey are a modification of the standard subterranean being matrix used on other worlds that the Creators have seeded.  The construction of this prototype race created various anomalies that were observed after initial synthesis.

It is one of the synthesis matrices the Creators use when seeding a world.  Each synthesis matrix is used to achieve the Creators' goals.  For Azeroth, a subterranean being matrix was modified to create a being with increased durability with an affinity for deep region shaping; the Earthen are the product of this modification.$B$BAfter the Earthen had been put into service for the Creators, unforeseen anomalies were discovered that affected their synthesis matrix due to high-stress environments.

Additional background information on the Earthen must be given to you before this question may be answered properly.$B$BProcessing.$B$BTo understand the anomalies of the Earthen, it is first important to understand what the Earthen represent in their design intent.  The Earthen represent the Creators' attempt at improving the survivability paradigm of the standard subterranean being matrix.  This was done by incorporating a resilient foundation of construction inherent to the world into said matrix.

It is the baseline material used in race synthesis.  A cross-section of Azeroth's crust was used as the foundation for the Earthen's synthesis rather than the typical biomass construction foundation used by the Creators.$B$BResearch on the world's composition led the Creators to theorize that an enhanced being could be synthesized that would epitomize the resiliency of this world's essence.  This was accomplished by choosing to use a blend of Azeroth's various stone core compounds as the foundation.

Simply stated, this is correct.$B$BThe Earthen's physical features are that of a smaller stature humanoid, though their composition is that of Azeroth's various stone core compounds.  Their design maximizes strength and stamina without sacrificing cognitive processing power.  Their skin and musculature are nearly impervious to physical damage, and with very minor modifications the Earthen display a remarkable resiliency to unwanted magical forces.

It is integral to the assimilation of this data that it is understood that the Creators wanted to synthesize a race that would long be an integral part of this world's development cycle after they had departed.  This race would be instrumental in fulfilling the Creators' long-term development objectives for Azeroth.  $B$BAs an ancillary note, the nomenclature "Earthen" was deemed apropos for the new race by the Creators, based on the Earthen's composition.

The Earthen's only anomaly in synthesis is the tendency for matrix destabilization while being utilized in high-stress environments.$B$BAddendum: deep earth sculpting was naturally suited to the new matrix design and thus never met the qualifications of duplicating a high-stress environment.$B$BDestabilization was not discovered until well into the Earthen's primary service cycle for the Creators.  The Creators began work on post-synthesis modification, rather than recall and re-synthesis.

[There is a noticeable pause after you ask this question.]$B$BThe information you request is not currently available in this repository's data cycling.  I sincerely apologize for this omission.$B$BPlease request this information after a data cycling update has been performed on this information repository.  You may also request this information from another information repository located on Azeroth.

There are two potential results when the Earthen's synthesis matrix destabilizes.  Initiating visual aid representation number one.$B$BThe first variant matrix is a degenerative product of synthesis, hereby designated with the common nomenclature of "Trogg".  This variant maintains strength and stamina comparable to the Earthen, but its cognitive processing power has been almost completely compromised.  Force of will and a strong sense of cunning are the only driving factors in the psyche of the trogg.

I am unable to process your chronological reference in comparison to the recording of this data, my apologies.$B$BThe trogg retains some composition of Azeroth's various stone core compounds, but the loss of cognitive power makes this variant unacceptable to the Creators.$B$BThe trogg procreates as per a standard biomass.  By default it consumes stone and anything else it can acquire, including other troggs.  Cannibalism is considered unacceptable by the Creators.

Initiating visual aid representation number two.$B$BThe second resultant variance of the Earthen matrix retains many desired elements when compared to the standard subterranean matrix.  The common nomenclature for this variant is "Dwarf".$B$BThis variant retains strength and stamina inherent to the Earthen.  In some cases, the dwarf even exceeds the cognitive powers of the Earthen's matrix.  The dwarf, however, retains none of the physical composition of Azeroth's various stone core compounds.

The data stored in this repository does indeed correlate with your astute proclamation.$B$BThe dwarf maintains an affinity for the stone composition of Azeroth, but due to the high-stress environmental anomaly within the Earthen's synthesis matrix, the dwarf reverts to a default biomass composition as seen in the standard subterranean matrix.$B$BErgo, the dwarf variant does synthesize from the degeneration of the Earthen creation matrix, as you inferred with your query.

I am unable to process your chronological reference in comparison to the recording of this data, my apologies.$B$BThough the dwarf maintains most of the Earthen's mental attunement to Azeroth's stone composition, the reversion back into living biomass remains the main degeneration of the matrix.  Dwarves eat and procreate through means typical to other standard biomasses.$B$BThe Creators view the dwarf as an acceptable variant, worthy of genesis in its own right.

The Creators are... the Creators.$B$BThey are the beings that seeded and shaped this world by their own design.  They are the reason for this world's existence, as well as many other worlds.  They are the wellspring from which Azeroth flows.

The Creators are cognizant of the magnitude of the information housed in this repository.  Subsequently, a portable copy of the data stored here will be made available to you once you are attuned with the Discs of Norgannon.$B$BPlease consider your cursory requirements for the assimilation of this knowledge to be complete.  At your leisure, access the Discs of Norgannon to begin synthesis of your discs.
So ye want to be a Blacksmith eh? Grab an apron and a hammer $g lad : lass;, let's see what ye've got.
I've not seen finer armor made in many years $n. Not since I trained under Grumnus Steelshaper in the Great Forge. I bet he could teach ye things about makin armor that would spark yer interest.
If ye want to find Grumnus, the first thing ye should do is head to Ironforge. Go to the very center of the city and look for the Great Forge, ye should find him there.

That's some impressive skill ye have there $n. The blades and hammers ye make surpass even my own, hard as that is to admit. Only person I ever met with skill even greater is Borgus Steelhand, I bet he could teach ye a thing or three.
Want to train with Borgus? Aye, I can tell ye where to find him. Head through the Square northwest of me forge, then take the western road. Ye'll find him in the second building on yer right.
Ye have some skill at weapon crafting $g lad : lass;,very impressive indeed. Now grab a hammer and let's see if ye can forge a real weapon.

The Shattered Hand's influence dominates these lands. We are the veil which covers Kalimdor: The protectorates, the police, the judges, the jury, and ultimately, the executioners. We see all, we know all.$B$BYou have grown much in the time which you have spent in service of the Hand, $n. The time has come to send you into the field.$B$BAre you prepared to undertake your next mission?~
What are ye daft? That's not a weapon, that's a dinner knife. I don't train amateurs.

Welcome to the Great Forge $g lad : lass;. It may be cold outside but we keep it nice and hot down 'ere. Grab a hammer, strike that anvil and show me ye've got what it takes to be a Blacksmith of the Great Forge!
Nice form $n, I bet a full mug at Bruuk's Corner that the function is just as solid. Ye know, ye might want to talk to Myolor Sunderfury. He'll set ya straight.
Course I can show ye where Myolor is. Right over there near the anvil of the Great Forge, that's where he does his work. Listen to his words well $g lad:lass;, Myolor is as skilled as they come.

Ye have my approval $n, ye can forge blades better than any I've trained in years. If ye want to make a real weapon though, ye need to talk with Myolor Sunderfury. That Dwarf will set ya on the right path.
So, off to see Myolor, eh? He's right o'er there... behind ye! Er, maybe in front of ye! Near the Great Anvil!

Something plagues this tower. I've fallen ill and the other Venture Co. employees that work near or in the tower have also become sick.$B$BJust last week, two of our patrollers died, only to instantly come back to life as mindless drones!$B$BThe lifeforce is draining from my body. I can feel myself losing control. Urges taking over... Bad urges... *Fizzule slaps himself in the face* Not yet... Listen... Mine is a position of power. This position privies me to some sensitive information.
Ye bothered me for that? Ye'd be better off strapping a dead rabbit to yer back and running through a Troll's den than wearing that piece of garbage.
$n, was it? That is a mighty fine piece of work ye have there. I'll take ye on, train ye how to make armor fit fer King Magni himself.

About five months ago, the Venture Co.'s Stranglethorn division got their hands on a special poison from a shady merchant in Booty Bay named Crank Fizzlebub. Fizzlebub had apparently stolen the poison from Zanzil!$B$BYes, Zanzil the Outcast - the troll that was exiled from his own tribe due to the nature of his 'experiments' in necromancy.$B$BNaturally, once they had the poison, they proceeded to test it on each other. The results were disastrous.

Grand Foreman Puzik Gallywix finally intervened, taking the surplus of poisons to his tower, here at the Sludge Fen, in order to study and research the unstable nature of the toxins. A decision was finally reached to share the secret of the poison with the Defias Brotherhood in exchange for a very large supply of a stable, usable poison.$B$BKlaven Mortwake of the Defias Brotherhood was tasked with the job of altering the chemical properties of Zanzil's mixture.

Fast forward to the present: The resultant formula works, allowing for the creation of a more controlled drone, however, the drawback is that the inactive compound is extremely volatile.$B$BGallywix, everyone in this tower and everyone outside are infected with the poison. It's affecting our minds and our bodies. Our internal organs have become soft and extremely fragile. This is your chance, $n. I don't have the strength to carry on and I sense that soon I will become one of 'them.'

The tower's defenses are at their weakest right now. The patrollers, sentries, lookouts, and even Gallywix himself are all infected and highly vulnerable to your special abilities and attacks.$B$BI want to see you enter that tower and when you exit, I want to see you covered in the blood of your enemies, the head of Grand Foreman Puzik Gallywix in your hands, and the last of that poison in your pack. Take what you recover to Shenthul. He'll know what to do... I hope.~
I hope that your interruption is for a good cause, I was in the middle of some important work.
FemaleText: I hope that your interruption is for a good cause, I was in the middle of some important work.

MaleText: Another Herbalist, hmm. I doubt your skill is as great as my own so perhaps I can train you in a few proper techniques.
FemaleText: Another Herbalist, hmm. I doubt your skill is as great as my own so perhaps I can train you in a few proper techniques.

MaleText: Ah, a fellow Fisherman. Are you perhaps in need of a little training? Maybe I can show you a thing or two?
FemaleText: Ah, a fellow Fisherman. Are you perhaps in need of a little training? Maybe I can show you a thing or two?

MaleText: Welcome to Stormwind. Took a long time to rebuild her but it was well worth it. So are you visiting, or are you here on business?
FemaleText: Welcome to Stormwind. Took a long time to rebuild her but it was well worth it. So are you visiting, or are you here on business?

MaleText: I don't get too many cooks in here looking for training, but I guess I could teach you something if you're ready.
FemaleText: I don't get too many cooks in here looking for training, but I guess I could teach you something if you're ready.

MaleText: Do I look like I have the time or energy to coddle every tourist that wanders through my door? Tell me what you need, and make it quick.
FemaleText: Do I look like I have the time or energy to coddle every tourist that wanders through my door? Tell me what you need, and make it quick.

MaleText: I don't get too many Skinners in here looking for training, but I guess I could teach you something if you're ready.
FemaleText: I don't get too many Skinners in here looking for training, but I guess I could teach you something if you're ready.

MaleText: The big wars might be over, for now, but we still have to keep our skills sharp!
FemaleText: The big wars might be over, for now, but we still have to keep our skills sharp!

MaleText: Stormwind is the pillar of the human race, maintained through strength of will and the edge of a sturdy blade.
FemaleText: Stormwind is the pillar of the human race, maintained through strength of will and the edge of a sturdy blade.

MaleText: Greetings.  You seek instruction in the art of war?
FemaleText: Greetings.  Do you seek instruction in art of war?

MaleText: No matter how much one learns, there is always more to know.
FemaleText: No matter how much one learns, there is always more to know.

MaleText: The warrior's role is one of protection.  Just as we protect our compatriots in battle, we must also protect the interests of the Forsaken.
FemaleText: The warrior's role is one of protection.  Just as we protect our compatriots in battle, we must also protect the interests of the Forsaken.

MaleText: Oh, a fellow Physician. I would be glad to teach you anything that would aid your journeys.
FemaleText: Oh, a fellow Physician. I would be glad to teach you anything that would aid your journeys.

MaleText: Yes my $g son : daughter;? What can I assist you with?
FemaleText: Yes my $g son : daughter;? What can I assist you with?

MaleText: I came from Ironforge to help out with the rebuilding effort here. If I can teach enough of ye my skills then maybe I can leave it to ye and take myself back home.
FemaleText: I came from Ironforge to help out with the rebuilding effort here. If I can teach enough of ye my skills then maybe I can leave it to ye and take myself back home.

MaleText: Yeah? Ye interrupted me, so ye better have a blasted good reason to do so.
FemaleText: Yeah? Ye interrupted me, so ye better have a blasted good reason to do so.

MaleText: Since the fall of Dalaran and the destruction of Quel'Thalas, wares of this sort have been hard to come by. But Lucan Cordell and some of our other Tradesman have been doing a fine job of filling our orders with quality merchandise.
FemaleText: Since the fall of Dalaran and the destruction of Quel'Thalas, wares of this sort have been hard to come by. But Lucan Cordell and some of our other Tradesman have been doing a fine job of filling our orders with quality merchandise.

MaleText: I sell only the finest arcane gear, made by the crafters and mages here in the city of Stormwind.
FemaleText: I sell only the finest arcane gear, made by the crafters and mages here in the city of Stormwind.

MaleText: Made by the finest craftsmen in all of Teldrassil, carried by hand from Kalimdor to Azeroth as a sign of the growing alliance between the people of the Great Tree and the humans of this land. If there is anything you require, you have but to ask.
FemaleText: Made by the finest craftsmen in all of Teldrassil, carried by hand from Kalimdor to Azeroth as a sign of the growing alliance between the people of the Great Tree and the humans of this land. If there is anything you require, you have but to ask.

MaleText: I sell only the best gear, tested and true. And the prices are set, so if you want to haggle then go find a Goblin.
FemaleText: I sell only the best gear, tested and true. And the prices are set, so if you want to haggle then go find a Goblin.

MaleText: I sell only the best gear, tested and true. And the prices are set, so if you want to haggle then go find a Goblin.

FemaleText: I sell only the best gear, tested and true. And the prices are set, so if you want to haggle then go find a Goblin.

MaleText: May the light guide your path and aid you in your journeys. If you need any assistance browsing, I will be right over here.
FemaleText: May the light guide your path and aid you in your journeys. If you need any assistance browsing, I will be right over here.

MaleText: May the light guide your path and aid you in your journies. If you need any assistance browsing, I will be right over here.
FemaleText: May the light guide your path and aid you in your journies. If you need any assistance browsing, I will be right over here.

MaleText: Don't let the humans in the Bazaar fool ye $g lad : lass;, with the subway those gnomes built it's easier than ye might think to transport goods from Ironforge. If they try to tack on import fees just tell them yer gonna buy yer gear from me.
FemaleText: Don't let the humans in the Bazaar fool ye $g lad : lass;, with the subway those gnomes built it's easier than ye might think to transport goods from Ironforge. If they try to tack on import fees just tell them yer gonna buy yer gear from me.

MaleText: If you insert tab A into slot B then of course it's going to go BOOM! Here, let me show you what I have and then you can ask Lilliam about how to put it together so it doesn't blow up.
FemaleText: If you insert tab A into slot B then of course it's going to go BOOM! Here, let me show you what I have and then you can ask Lilliam about how to put it together so it doesn't blow up.

MaleText: No one's ever stolen anything out of here. Not in the whole history of... the whole history!
FemaleText: No one's ever stolen anything out of here. Not in the whole history of... the whole history!

MaleText: Welcome to the Blue Recluse, where the magically inclined gather to blow off steam. Though not literally of course. What can I get for you $g sir : ma'am;?
FemaleText: Welcome to the Blue Recluse, where the magically inclined gather to blow off steam. Though not literally of course. What can I get for you $g sir : ma'am;?

MaleText: Take my advice, don't sit close to the shadows.
FemaleText: Take my advice, don't sit close to the shadows.

MaleText: Welcome to the Pig and Whistle! Grab a drink my friend and pull up a seat, the more the merrier!
FemaleText: Welcome to the Pig and Whistle! Grab a drink my friend and pull up a seat, the more the merrier!

MaleText: Welcome to the Bank of Stormwind. We offer financial accounts and safety deposit boxes for valuable items. Do you already have an account with us $g sir : ma'am;?
FemaleText: Welcome to the Bank of Stormwind. We offer financial accounts and safety deposit boxes for valuable items. Do you already have an account with us $g sir : ma'am;?

MaleText: We are the only supplier of healthy flowers in all of Stormwind. We provide beautiful blooms for any occasion.
FemaleText: We are the only supplier of healthy flowers in all of Stormwind. We provide beautiful blooms for any occasion.

MaleText: Where is it ye would like to go $g lad : lass;? For just a few coin my Gryphons can get ye there faster than even the swiftest horse.
FemaleText: Where is it ye would like to go $g lad : lass;? For just a few coin my Gryphons can get ye there faster than even the swiftest horse.

MaleText: These great beasts know paths that ye can't find on foot, they'll get ye there fast and maybe show ye something new at the same time.
FemaleText: These great beasts know paths that ye can't find on foot, they'll get ye there fast and maybe show ye something new at the same time.

MaleText: Speak quietly and with great care, the wrong word in these parts could get your throat cut. Now, what is it you need from me?
FemaleText: Speak quietly and with great care, the wrong word in these parts could get your throat cut. Now, what is it you need from me?

MaleText: Speak quietly and with great care, the wrong word in these parts could get your throat cut. Now, what is it you need from me?
FemaleText: Speak quietly and with great care, the wrong word in these parts could get your throat cut. Now, what is it you need from me?

MaleText: Welcome to the Stormwind Guild Registry offices. What can I help you with today?
FemaleText: Welcome to the Stormwind Guild Registry offices. What can I help you with today?

MaleText: Welcome to the Stormwind Guild Registry offices. What can I help you with today?
FemaleText: Welcome to the Stormwind Guild Registry offices. What can I help you with today?

MaleText: I hope ye didn't come all the way to the Great Forge just to stay warm. Speak up $g lad : lass;, tell me what it is I can do for ye?

Ye have the look of a Blacksmith to ye. Soot under the nails, steel in yer bones. Aye, very much the blood of a Blacksmith in yer veins. Which means ye've come to me looking to learn a thing or two, well $g lad : lass; grab a hammer. Let's see what I can teach ye.
What are you looking for?
FemaleText: What are you looking for?

MaleText: Krumn is the bull you are looking for. He can be found on the lower rise at Thunder Bluff Civic Information.
FemaleText: Krumn is the bull you are looking for. He can be found on the lower rise at Thunder Bluff Civic Information.

MaleText: The Thunder Bluff Bank can be found on the lower rise.
FemaleText: The Thunder Bluff Bank can be found on the lower rise.

MaleText: Seek out Turak Runetotem in the Hall of Elders on the Elder Rise.
FemaleText: Seek out Turak Runetotem in the Hall of Elders on the Elder Rise.

MaleText: Ahh, you will need to make your way over to the Hunter's Hall then. Several great hunters like Holt Thunderhorn can be found there on the Hunter Rise.
FemaleText: Ahh, you will need to make your way over to the Hunter's Hall then. Several great hunters like Holt Thunderhorn can be found there on the Hunter Rise.

MaleText: A follower of the arcane are you?  Hmph!  Very well then... you can find them around the Pools of Vision underneath the Spirit Rise.
FemaleText: A follower of the arcane are you?  Hmph!  Very well then... you can find them around the Pools of Vision underneath the Spirit Rise.

MaleText: The Hall of Spirits is where our shamans call home.  You can find it on the Spirit Rise.  May your ancestors watch over you.
FemaleText: The Hall of Spirits is where our shamans call home.  You can find it on the Spirit Rise.  May your ancestors watch over you.

MaleText: Aspiring to join our ranks one day?  Sark Ragetotem can help you on your way.  He's in the Hunter's Hall.
FemaleText: Aspiring to join our ranks one day?  Sark Ragetotem can help you on your way.  He's in the Hunter's Hall.

MaleText: Which trainer do you seek?
FemaleText: Which trainer do you seek?

MaleText: Which profession?
FemaleText: Which profession?

MaleText: It's fascinating... I have heard orcs proclaim the odor of humans to be sickening and I have heard humans proclaim the odor of orcs to be wretched; yet, to me, all of the races of these lands give off the same odor: The foul, dizzying scent of greed.$B$BDo you doubt the validity of my claim? Do you not see these things that run your life as merely runoff from the greed which dictates your every decision?$B$BSo be it. As it was greed that displaced me from my home, it shall be greed that takes me back.

So you have returned to help Kum'isha, $r? Do not worry, the pang that you feel in the pit of your stomach is merely your willpower collapsing.$B$BThankfully, you will not need willpower for this collection. I am certain that you will enjoy the trinkets I will have waiting for you upon your return with the item.~
Then head over to Bena's Alchemy on the middle rise and talk to Bena herself.  She will be able to help you master the art of potion brewing.
FemaleText: Then head over to Bena's Alchemy on the middle rise and talk to Bena herself.  She will be able to help you master the art of potion brewing.

MaleText: There is no finer cook in Thunder Bluff than Aska Mistrunner.  Mmmmm, I can smell what she is cooking from here.  Head over to her kitchen located on the high rise.~~Drat... now I am hungry.
FemaleText: There is no finer cook in Thunder Bluff than Aska Mistrunner.  Mmmmm, I can smell what she is cooking from here.  Head over to her kitchen located on the high rise.~~Drat... now I am hungry.

MaleText: Check out Dawnstrider Enchanters on the middle rise then.  Teg will be more than happy to help you in whatever way he can.
FemaleText: Check out Dawnstrider Enchanters on the middle rise then.  Teg will be more than happy to help you in whatever way he can.

MaleText: First Aid is always a nice skill to have.  Many a time during battle has it saved my hide.  Visit Spiritual Healing on the Spirit Rise.  Pand Stonebinder can teach you all you need to know to save your hide as well.
FemaleText: First Aid is always a nice skill to have.  Many a time during battle has it saved my hide.  Visit Spiritual Healing on the Spirit Rise.  Pand Stonebinder can teach you all you need to know to save your hide as well.

MaleText: Don't blame you for taking up fishing.  Mulgore has some the best fishing spots in Southern Kalimdor and Mountaintop Bait & Tackle on the high rise has all of the gear you'll need to take advantage of it.~~Tell Kah Mistrunner that I sent ya!
FemaleText: Don't blame you for taking up fishing.  Mulgore has some the best fishing spots in Southern Kalimdor and Mountaintop Bait & Tackle on the high rise has all of the gear you'll need to take advantage of it.~~Tell Kah Mistrunner that I sent ya!

MaleText: Komin Winterhoof at Holistic Herbalism is the one you want to talk to then.  He can be found on the middle rise.
FemaleText: Komin Winterhoof at Holistic Herbalism is the one you want to talk to then.  He can be found on the middle rise.

MaleText: Go see Una at Thunder Bluff Armorers then.  It can be found on the middle rise.
FemaleText: Go see Una at Thunder Bluff Armorers then.  It can be found on the middle rise.

MaleText: Brek Stonehoof can be found at Stonehoof Geology on the lower rise and can teach you the proper way to harvest precious ores and gems.
FemaleText: Brek Stonehoof can be found at Stonehoof Geology on the lower rise and can teach you the proper way to harvest precious ores and gems.

MaleText: Tepa is renown for her clothwork.  She can be found at Thunder Bluff Armorers on the middle rise.
FemaleText: Tepa is renown for her clothwork.  She can be found at Thunder Bluff Armorers on the middle rise.

MaleText: Mooranta can help you learn skinning.  She can be found just outside the Thunder Bluff Armorers on the middle rise.
FemaleText: Mooranta can help you learn skinning.  She can be found just outside the Thunder Bluff Armorers on the middle rise.

MaleText: The beasts of these blasted lands exhibit preternatural attributes, heretofore unseen in nature.$B$BWe have theorized that the energy which was released upon the opening of the Dark Portal, infused into their physical being and forced the creatures to evolve into their current forms.$B$BFearsome beasts they are, no doubt, but we also believe that they could prove to be quite useful in our studies.$B$BPerhaps you would be interested in assisting us in the study of these beasts, $n?~

FemaleText: While my brother, Drazial, focuses his analysis on the more physical nature of the beasts of the blasted lands, I tend to focus on the more cerebral and spiritual aspects of the wildlife.$B$BIt is true that the beasts exhibit extremely unusual strength, agility, and stamina, but some of them also possess great intelligence and regenerative abilities, untied to their physical being.$B$BPerhaps you would be interested in helping advance my research, $r?~

MaleText: It's hard to imagine that so much death and despair could be confined to such a small area; yet beyond the swamp is a land plagued by chaos and destruction.$B$BWatch your step, adventurer. The Blasted Lands are the final resting place to far greater beings than you.

Thrall's Grasp they called us: Twenty of Thrall's most accomplished and honored soldiers.$B$BI had ordered the regiment to build an encampment here, on the border of the Blasted Lands, while we waited for our orders to arrive from Orgrimmar. Weeks passed without word from the warchief; the men grew restless.$B$BIt was a judgment call, $n. I was young and ambitious, afraid of nothing. The battalion would set forth into the Blasted Lands under my command.$B$BA decision I would later regret.

Regret. It is all I have now. One bad decision resulting in several horrible outcomes. If only I had waited for those orders. Maybe they would have detailed the horrors that awaited us in those cursed lands! Maybe they were to redirect us to another detail? Ultimately, it was my fault. All of it was my fault.

Would you believe that in my darkest hour, at the apex of my being, I failed.$B$BAs I fled from the wanton destruction of the forces that overwhelmed us, the only sounds I could hear were the screams of my soldiers and the rapid beat of my own heart.$B$BA short while later, I returned to the Blasted Lands in hopes of rescuing my men and restoring my honor. Instead I was captured and beaten until dead.$B$BWhat I found out during my inquisition and subsequent torture was horrifying.

My captors were cruel beyond measure, $n. They would alternate between Lieutenant Kirith and I, torturing one while the other watched. During a lull in the activity of an especially brutal day, Kirith told me what had happened to my men and a plan he had been formulating to free them from their masters.$B$BThey suffered a fate far worse than death, or even the pain Kirith and I  endured.

Neither you nor I could possibly imagine the pain an individual suffers when their soul is ripped from their body. They are not dead and by no means are they alive. Instead, they walk the land, servants of those that bind them to this world.$B$BLord Razelikh, demonic overlord of these lands, enslaved them all. Nine he took for his own, placing stones of binding near the Dark Portal. The remaining nine were divided up between his subordinates.

The archmage Allistarj of the Shadowsworn was granted three. Lady Sevine, warlock of the Shadowsworn was also granted three. The remaining three were given to Grol the Destroyer, lord of the Dreadmaul ogres of these blasted lands.$B$BYou see, $n, without a soul, the body cannot be killed. The remnants of my men are now indestructible fighting units. Thankfully, they are bound in how far they can travel by the stones of binding.

They are exactly what you need to destroy in order to free the regiment! As I had told you earlier, Kirith had a plan.$B$BEach of the servants does have a weakness. Punish their physical form in proximity of their stones until they are near the state of disintegration. It is at that point, and that point alone, that the stones of binding are vulnerable to attack. You must hurry to destroy the stones, however, as once the enslaved regain their composure, they will be invulnerable to harm once more.

I wish it were true, $n, but it will take more than you alone to overcome the forces of Razelikh and his subordinates.$B$BGather a suitable group of adventurers and would-be heroes and free my men of their eternal torture! Eighteen stones you must shatter.$B$BFight hard and die with honor, $n.
In need of some alchemy supplies, are we?  Or do you have other business with me?
Living out here in the desert is rough! I get so thirsty standing outside in this heat.
Help!$B$BIf you get me out of here, I can blow up the door that leads to the chief of Zul'Farrak!
We have to kill more trolls!  Kill enough and I'll blow the door to the troll chief!
Thanks, $n.  If you hadn't shown up I'm sure we would have been dead meat!  Now the only thing between us and the chief troll is that door yonder...
Help!  My band and I have been captured by trolls, and they're going to sacrifice us!$B$BGet us out of here and I'll give you anything you want.
We don't have time to talk!  We have to think about those trolls!
Thanks a lot, $n.  We couldn't have made it without you.  Oh, and if I had mentioned before something about repaying you for saving us, well... you can forget it!

FemaleText: Hi there! I have a proposition for an adventure-seeker such as you, if you are up to the challenge!$B$BAlong with my invention, the Super Egg-O-Matic, I am hard at work aiding the druids with their campaign to save the hippogryphs. The birds are being affected by the evil effects of the Gordunni ogres inhabiting the ruins of Feralas, and their numbers are dwindling.$B$BI collect many different types of eggs.  Will you help and find some for me?

In a place called Feralas to the west of here, the hippogryphs, long-time companions of the night elves, are in danger.$B$BI need you to rescue an egg from the ruins of Isildien, to the south, there. The Super Egg-O-Matic can analyze any egg brought to it and judge if it is likely to hatch. I then send the eggs along to the druids, safe from the Gordunni ogres' dark magics.$B$BPlease know, $n, some of the rescued eggs are bad eggs, and will never hatch.

MaleText: Hello, $n! If you don't see it in my shop, chances are good I can get it!

FemaleText: The Gordunni are a large ogre tribe that has control over considerable portions of forests in Feralas. Their dark magic seeps into the elements around them, damaging both the environment and the creatures that inhabit it.$B$BIf you do decide to travel to Feralas, please be mindful of these ogres -- they are quite nasty and many are able to wield powerful dark magic.

MaleText: I just can't seem to get comfortable without a sturdy ceiling of granite over my head. All these stars up there, enough to give ye the shivers.
Welcome to my forge, Blacksmith. Let me share with you a little secret. No one, no one in the world can you trust. Not men, not women, not beasts ... this you can trust, Steel.
What is it you seek at my forge? Is it training? Do you perhaps seek the secrets of steel? The mysteries of the forge? Speak up Grunt!
Travel to Orgrimmar, to the Valley of Honor. There she lives with her husband and two daughters. All of them are smiths of great skill, but the spirits tell me that she will best guide your learning.

You guide the spirits in the steel to protect and defend with far more skill than I ever could. The student has surpassed the teacher and now I must send you to where your education may continue. $n, you must seek out Shayis Steelfury in Orgrimmar. She is the finest Armorsmith I have ever known, and she can teach you much.

Everything has a spirit, if you learn to listen to it you can get it to take any shape you want. Blacksmithing isn't about beating metal, forcing it to do your will. It's about listening to the spirit within the steel and guiding it to the shape you know it wants to take.

You have the look of a $g man : woman; who seeks knowledge. Perhaps you seek the teachings of the forge, and the hammer. Perhaps I can guide you down that path. But only once you have accepted the spirits, and listened to their calling.
Make the journey to Orgrimmar and seek him out in the Valley of Honor. He works in a shop called the Arms of Legend.

That is a fine weapon indeed $n. You guide the spirits like few I have ever known. Listen to them and they will guide you as you have guided them. Go, seek out the Orc known as Kelgruk Bloodaxe. He does not speak with the spirits but he does listen, and his weapons are the finest I have ever laid my eyes upon.
How is the edge of your steel? Good enough to cut through the belly of your enemy? Let me show you some things to make it even sharper.
Want to be a smith? Want to forge blades to gut your foe? Hammers to crush his skull? Aye I can help, and gladly too if there is blood to be shed from it.
Welcome back to the Great Forge, $n. Ye come to visit an old Dwarf or do ye think yer ready for the next step in yer training?
Good steel $n. Grab a hammer and come over here, let me show you the secret to forging a legendary weapon.
What is it? Can't you see I'm busy?

FemaleText: I see potential in you $n. Now grab a hammer and some of those scraps, you need a lot of practice.
I don't train smiths with no skill, come back when you have something decent to show me.

MaleText: Brzzzzt!$B$BWelcome to Matrix Punchograph 3005 stroke A, a security level alpha terminal.$B$BYou must posses a white punch card to access terminal functions.~~01000100 01101111 01110111 01101110 00100000 01110111 01101001 01110100 01101000 00100000 01110100 01101000 01100101 00100000 01101000 01101111 01110010 01100100 01100101 00100001

Brzzzzt!$B$BWelcome to Matrix Punchograph 3005 stroke B, a security level beta terminal.$B$BYou must posses a yellow punch card to access terminal functions.~~01000111 01101110 01101111 01101101 01100101 01110010 01100011 01111001 00100001

Brzzzzt!$B$BWelcome to Matrix Punchograph 3005 stroke D, a security level delta terminal.$B$BYou must posses a red punch card to access terminal functions.~~01010011 01101000 01101111 01110010 01110100 00100000 01100001 01101110 01100100 00100000 01110011 01110111 01100101 01100101 01110100
Eraka no Kimbul$BGod of Tigers, Lord of Beasts, King of Cats, the Prey's Doom$B$BUeetay no Mueh'zala$BGod of Death, Father of Sleep, Son of Time, the Night's Friend.
Elortha no Shadra$BGod of Spiders, Mother of Venom, Silk Dancer, Death's Love.

The Matrix Punchograph Technologic Huerist-o-meter has detected your aptitude in engineering.  You may now choose from the following option(s):~~01000111 01101111 00100000 01100111 01101111 00100000 01100111 01101111 00100001 00100001

FemaleText: Please, a moment, $n. Kindal is down below in the Grimtotem camp trying to free the faerie dragons from captivity. We were just lucky that help came along when it did. Who knows what those foul tauren would have done to them.

MaleText: Salutations.  I am a guardian of entry.  Unless you have the Plates of Uldum already integrated with your disc set, I will not allow for entry into the Uldum compound.

My purpose is to regulate access to the Uldum complex for the Creators.  I allow entry into the compound only when the solicitor exhibits for access the proper sequencing discs.$B$BYour disc set currently does not contain the Plates of Uldum, the primary prerequisite for entry.  Access is not granted unless the Plates of Uldum are present.

The Plates of Uldum are discs synthesized by the Creators that allow access into the Uldum compound.  These discs house and store specific data related to the Creators' activities here.$B$BPhysically, they are nearly identical in circumference to the disc set you currently possess.  Their markings, however, are directly related to information on Uldum as opposed to the Uldaman complex.

Several sets of the Plates of Uldum have been synthesized by the Creators for their expressed use.  The Creators control the distribution of said discs for all complexes on this world.  As such, Azeroth has been rescheduled for visitation, and therefore future discs may enter circulation at that time.$B$BExisting discs have been fully distributed to those parties with appropriate security clearance.

The Creators use visitation as a means to reestablish control over seeded worlds when forces, both external and internal, upset the matrix dynamics associated with it.  Such tactics are not to be taken lightly when executed by the Creators.$B$BFor additional information on this world's scheduled visitation, please consult the appropriate data repository that fields all Creator-related scheduling considerations.

Uldum is a research facility for the Creators in their continuing efforts to enhance the biosphere of Azeroth.  Specific information regarding their work as it relates to Uldum is restricted to those individuals who possess the Plates of Uldum in their disc sets.$B$BData repositories inside the Uldum complex have been programmed to address specific experiments and data compilations; please refer to them for detailed information.

FemaleText: Thank the light you are here! I'd accept help from a two-headed ogre at this point.~~The city has been overrun by troggs! The attempts to wipe them out resulted in mass contamination. But there is still hope.~~Our scientists who evacuated to Ironforge are working on a cure for the fallout sickness. Meanwhile, if you can help me stop the trogg invasion, perhaps the city can be retaken.

MaleText: Give me a couple minutes, $n. There was some excitement in here a moment ago, and I just want to make sure things have died back down. I'll talk to you soon enough.
Welcome to Blue Moon Odds and Ends, $c.  If you have any questions, please let me know.

Brzzzzt!$B$BWelcome to Matrix Punchograph 3005 stroke D, a security level delta terminal.$B$BRed punch card detected.  Access Granted.~~01001000 01101111 01110111 00100000 01100001 01101101 00100000 01001001 00100000 01100100 01110010 01101001 01110110 01101001 01101110 01100111 00111111

Incredible power can be found in the spirits or "muisek" of the creatures that we battle against.$B$BLook inside yourself; learn to harness the power of your own spirit, and you will be more powerful than you ever imagined.

Sul'thraze... the first time I heard the word uttered I was around your age. It meant nothing to me then, as it means nothing to you now. It was not until a warband of trolls coming from Zul'Farrak laid waste to the land that I understood... and feared.$B$BMany will tell you that the Splitblade of Suffering does not exist. That it's a myth; a rumor started to scare children 'straight.' But believe me, $r, it exists.$B$B<Trenton loses focus as he runs his hand across the jagged scar on his face.>
Split in two to form the one. The twin blades are bound to Zul'Farrak.$B$BSul'thraze reborn when the twins are found.
The guards of Theramore are the finest group of Alliance soldiers based in Kalimdor. It is our duty to uphold the laws of the Alliance even so far away from our homes.

We don't know much about the burning of the Shady Rest Inn, except that James Hyal's wife and child were unable to escape.$b$bWe managed to drag James out, but he hasn't been the same since.$b$bWe have many leads but not much evidence. It is our hope that through the efforts of the guard and the vigilant help of the people of Theramore, we will unravel this terrible crime.$b$bIf you would like to lend assistance to the investigation, what remains of the inn can be found at the border to the Barrens.
Can you see them, mortal? No... I did not think you could. Sighted but sightless - it is your gift and your curse.
The humans claimed much of the Dustwallow Marsh for themselves, but the Stonemaul clan, with our help, has been able to push them back.

The humans built an inn on the edge of the Barrens. The Shady Rest, they called it. Weeks ago, it was burned down.$b$bThe Warchief told us to leave the humans alone, so long as they didn't cross our borders, but it appears someone violated his wishes.$b$bHe has put me in charge of getting to the bottom of it. If you wish to provide assistance, go to the remains of the Shady Rest Inn and return any clues you find to me.

If Reethe is somehow involved with the burning of the Shady Rest Inn, you'll have to find him and get some answers out of him.$b$bI sent Ogron to track him down. He was headed off to the southeast. Meet up with Ogron and then go find Reethe.

FemaleText: I don't care to hear it, $n. Nope, no way are you going to be let into the Searing Gorge. Impossible. Not going to happen. How many times do I have to tell you - I can't let you in! Do you not speak common? Are you an orc in disguise? N-O. NO!$B$BIf I let you in, then I have to let everybody in. Pretty soon your close friends will want in, then their distant relatives, then their friends, and so on and so forth. The last time that happened... well, we won't talk about the last time it happened.

Are you mad? Do you know what manner of beast inhabit that place? The worst that can happen is that we'll have to scoop up your remains with a shovel. We've lost some good dwarves to those awful monsters.$B$BSo the answer is no. If you're bent on getting to the Searing Gorge, you'll have to find another way.

I shouldn't even be telling you this but if you can make it past all the critters and beasties in Badlands, you might be able to make it to Searing Gorge.$B$BYes, the Badlands. There's some type of back road the orcs paved near Kargath. Just goes to show you what kind of fools we're dealing with here! A backdoor to hell? What were they thinking?
Invulnerable?
You're a fool that should heed my warnings. No one is invulnerable. You would be wise to remember that bit of advice.

I'll tell you what. Since you fancy yourself the hero type, if you can make your way through the Badlands to the Searing Gorge and bring me back something to prove your heroics, I'll see what I can do about getting you a key.$B$BIn the southeasternmost corner of Searing Gorge is a lady almost as tough as me, Margol the Rager. Maybe you should investigate.

MaleText: What can you do at an inn?$B$BWell when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably.  Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness.  When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.$B$BYou may also speak with any innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.
FemaleText: What can you do at an inn?$B$BWell when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably.  Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness.  When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.$B$BYou may also speak with any innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.

MaleText: You are well on your way, $n.  But you still have much to learn.  The southern Barrens may be where your next lesson is found.
Although we call this land the Barrens, to one who knows where to look this place teems with life.
I sell the finest cloth and leather garb this side of the valley!

FemaleText: You've come further than many, $n. Respect the elements around you and you shall fare far greater than most.

MaleText: The altar seems to beckon to you as if it were alive.
Praise Elune! It has been many years since I have had visitors.

As a young night elf in Darkshore, I crossed paths with a group of unsavory individuals known as the Twilight's Hammer. A group of them befriended me and shamefully, I ended up eschewing my faith in Elune and embracing the vitriol of the Twilight's Hammer.$B$BIt was not until a vision came to me from Elune, that I woke up from the malaise that I had fallen into as a follower of the old gods.$B$BIn repentance, I began work on my prayer to Elune.

Etched into a tablet of pure gold was the embodiment of my remorse, shame, regret, and sorrow. Unfortunately, the Twilight's Hammer found the tablet and branded me a blasphemer. I was summarily executed, my prayer to Elune incomplete. I am now bound to this world as a spirit, unable to transcend to the Nether; held in this cage as a warning to all that would betray the faith of the Twilight's Hammer.~

The ancient Altar of Hakkar stands silently near the entrance to the room.$B$BLooking to the balconies above it, you notice a large serpent-like statue rests on each. The statues look very much like the ones on the altar before you. They must be related in some way...
FemaleText: The ancient Altar of Hakkar stands silently near the entrance to the room.$B$BLooking to the balconies above it, you notice a large serpent-like statue rests on each. The statues look very much like the ones on the altar before you. They must be related in some way...

MaleText: Existing in this area are many creatures considered allies of the night elves. The elves have had access to the power within each of these creatures; it is time that the horde be allowed this same satisfaction. I have devised a way that this power can be captured and used for our benefit.$B$BDo not doubt what I tell you, $n. Help me, and you shall see that I speak truth.
If tailoring is your thing, Vizzklick will most definitely have your supplies. Take a look around, $n, and let me know if you wish to purchase something!

Grab your things, $n! I've just gotten word from Nilith Lokrav in the Searing Gorge that the Undermarket has set up operations in the heart of the Cauldron. Find Nilith Lokrav in the Searing Gorge and get the low down!
One bright light appears accross the room, then disppears. Then you notice another beam... and then another.$B$BThey seem to be showing you a pattern.
FemaleText: One bright light appears accross the room, then disppears. Then you notice another beam... and then another.$B$BThey seem to be showing you a pattern.

MaleText: Vengeance shall be mine.

My father was slain by the filth that inhabits the cauldron. My pleas for assistance to the Stormwind magistrate fell on deaf ears. Nay, they want not to admit that this part of the world even exists, let alone send their precious military in to administer justice.$B$BI seek vengeance, $r, plain and simple. Is there a more passionate cause in this world?

As you can see, I am but one man with a lumbering oaf of a squire. The might of the Dark Iron dwarves and the beasts held in the grip of Ragnaros would surely overwhelm me alone, but I have the utmost confidence that such a brave and ambitious adventurer such as you would have no problem handling the denizens of the cauldron. Should you choose to assist me, I shall reward you with riches and wealth beyond your wildest dreams.

I give unto you cordial salutations, $r.  You've come far off the beaten path merely to speak to someone dwelling inside a cave.  I trust there is a reason for your strange, yet not unforeseen visit here.  Yes?

Greetings, $Gsir:miss;. I am Master Xylem's apprentice Nyrill. If you have any concerns, please feel free to bring them up with the master.$B$BI will be here to serve you when you're ready to return down to the base of the mountain.

I know who you are, $n.  Fate and forces beyond that have brought you to me for a reason, and it is one I take no pleasure in being a part of.  There are many decisions you will make in the coming times, and I hope you are wise enough to make the correct ones.$B$BBelieve me, $r, when I tell you this - there are correct choices.

You are quite inquisitive, though such inquisitiveness belies a general lack of understanding.  I say this because were you to have a definite purpose in being here, the question you ask would seem pointless. $B$BWith that, I bid you good day.

You know I do, mortal; I am abandoning a fair number of pretenses here, and I recommend you do the same.$B$BYou have come here clearly because you know that what you possess, garnered from your actions within the Sunken Temple of the Atal'al, has brought you to me for a purpose.  This purpose is to put my associate... my brother, to rest.  He is trapped within a nightmare within the Dream itself.  He cannot break free alone.

The god that the Atal'ai trolls had brought forth is to blame for this.
